ygData.subject: Slime 'bug'
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a way to slowly make a lot of money.  I have made over 40,000,000 dollars in one level.  Here s how to do it : When your main character is pretty
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 30
Message-ID: <17248.30.95.959279670@...>
Date: Tue, 13 Apr 1999 19:39:03 +0000
From: "Seth Mitchell" <smitchell@...
Subject: Slime 'bug'

There is a way to slowly make a lot of money.  I have made over 
40,000,000 dollars in one level.  Here's how to do it :

When your main character is pretty well-off

1.  Hire a Slime.
2.  Train the Slime so it has a lot of stuff (Intelligence and Armor 	  
    are best)
3.  Go to an empty level.
4.  Let the Slime reproduce
5.  Kill the reproductions
6.  If a shield is left, take it, if not, try again.

Sometimes the Slimes will resurrect over their shields, and you get 
the money.  I'm not sure how it works, but sometimes when you 
exit the level, you dont keep any slimes.  I'm not sure, but I think if 
you DON'T kill the starting slime, then you'll keep every slime you 
have at the end of the level.  Then you can upgrade those, kill their 
offspring, and make a lot of money.  


--
SgMitchell
smitchell@...
